description: Crispy fried toast served with ice-cold jam, served with fresh fruit and ice cream platter, suitable as a snack for your afternoon tea

purchaseNotes.title: Appointment reminder
purchaseNotes.content: Reservation is required, you may need to wait for a table during peak consumption

purchaseNotes.title: Rule reminder
purchaseNotes.content: Each purchase coupon is recommended for 1 people to use

purchaseNotes.title: Dine in and take away
purchaseNotes.content: Dine-in are available but take-out aren't available
